about_the_game:
Diana's Quest: Guide is a spoiler document with all the detailed information you need to complete the game and unlock all Steam achievements.


  • This DLC contains a PDF FULL OF SPOILERS about Diana's Quest: From Princess to Peasant.

↳ To access the document, you need to go to the location:
📁 C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Diana's Quest: From Princess to Peasant\Diana's Quest - Guide.pdf

content_descriptors.notes: Diana's Quest: Guide is a walkthrough document with spoilers of an adult game, but it doesn't have graphic images with genitalia, explicit sex, or nudity. It's a guide about the game features, how they work, each spell the protagonist can learn, and the monsters can use against them.

  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
